quote: In order to understand if you solve tasks correctly, you have to see what God thinks about you. And it turns out, that the oncoming thought, yes?.. of God is your way. Well, logically it is so: the thought of God is the development of your events. - THE TEACHING OF GRIGORI GRABOVOI ABOUT GOD. CREATION OF BODY BY THE SOUL, 2004
author: GRIGORI GRABOVOI
